JS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_DESC:
JavaScript Basics Tutorial
JavaScript na programming language wey you fit use take control computer.

1. Comments To write note wey computer no go run, use //. 
// Comment dey start with //
// Computer no dey run anything wey get //
// Na just note for you to sabi wetin your code dey do

2. Display Text and Numbers To make computer show text, use console.log():
console.log("Welcome")
To show number:
console.log(100)

3. Variables To keep text or number, use let:
let name = "Ali";
let age = 20;

4. Functions This function dey add two numbers together:
function add(a, b) {
   return a + b;
}
To call the function:
let result = add(x, y);

5. Condition Statements Example using if and else:
let a = 20;
let b = 2;

if (a > b) {
   console.log("a big pass b")
} else {
    console.log("a small pass b")
}

6. Arrays To keep many items together, use array:
let myeggs = [];
If you want start with items inside:
let ages = [10, 22];
let shelf = ["book", "fruit", "bottle"];
To get items inside array:
console.log(ages[1]); // 22
console.log(shelf[2]); // bottle
Length dey show how many items dey inside:
console.log(myeggs.length);
console.log(shelf.length);

7. Loops To repeat action or check each item one by one, use for...of loop:
for (let drawer of shelf) {
    console.log(drawer);
}

JavaScript dey grow well well and get plenty features wey you go learn for next tutorials.
For this tutorial, you don learn wetin JavaScript be and small small basics wey follow am.
